# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [Unreleased]

- Add support for Python 3.14
- Add tool version to HTML reports
- Bump python-gitlab to v7.0.0
- Deprecate support for Python 3.9
- Fix issue with Gradle dependencies when list is empty
- Improve the back-off/retry implementation for GitLab API errors

## [0.1.2] - 2025-10-23

- Add feature to fetch declared license from package repositories (PyPI and NPM)
- Add support for local dependency list input
- Bump python-gitlab to v6.5.0
- Fix critical issue with Maven processing and error handling
- Fix issues with GitHub URL parsing
- Fix potential dependency duplication across programming languages
- Fix to correctly display console warning for Eclipse Dash execution errors

## [0.1.1] - 2025-10-09

- Add support for Conda packages
- Bump Eclipse Dash to the latest version
- Bump PyGithub to v2.8.1
- Bump python-gitlab to v6.4.0
- Bump requests to v2.32.5
- General improvements and bug fixes

## [0.1.0] - 2025-07-21

- Initial release of the tool
